item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, October 1, 2024 at 7:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Ryujinx (Nintendo Switch emulator) has been removed from GitHub (190 points | 116 comments)
2. Is the world really running out of sand? (236 points | 81 comments)
3. The $1k Wheelchair (88 points | 41 comments)
4. Quake runs in just 276 kB RAM on the Arduino Nano Matter board (54 points | 4 comments)
5. Launch HN: Quetzal (YC S24) – Stripe for Internationalization (19 points | 5 comments)
6. ESO telescope captures the most detailed infrared map of the Milky Way (206 points | 47 comments)
7. Show HN: Sourcebot, an open-source Sourcegraph alternative (50 points | 6 comments)
8. Anthropic hires OpenAI co-founder Durk Kingma (51 points | 17 comments)
9. OpenAI DevDay 2024 live blog (89 points | 20 comments)
10. A Local-First Case Study (4 points | discuss)
11. Ask HN: Who is hiring? (October 2024) (128 points | 122 comments)
12. Boris Vallejo and the pixel art of the demoscene (446 points | 109 comments)
13. Comparing our Rust-based indexing and querying pipeline to Langchain (76 points | 41 comments)
14. Show HN: 73,530 free book summaries in 40 languages (with paid audio) (14 points | 20 comments)
15. Show HN: A real time AI video agent with under 1 second of latency (150 points | 76 comments)
16. Comedy Theory (2022) (210 points | 148 comments)
17. Bop Spotter (2283 points | 365 comments)
18. NewsCatcher News API (YC S22) Is Hiring ( | hide)
19. The $621M Legal Battle by Record Labels Against Internet Archive (16 points | 1 comment)
20. Ask HN: Who wants to be hired? (October 2024) (67 points | 155 comments)
21. Gorhill pulls uBlock Origin Lite from Firefox store (153 points | 227 comments)
22. Pro bettors disguising themselves as gambling addicts (136 points | 149 comments)
23. Earth has caught a 'second moon' (29 points | 26 comments)
24. ScanOSS spams OSS projects for using profanity (18 points | 11 comments)
25. Ask HN: Should you reply STOP to unwanted texts? (227 points | 309 comments)
26. Show HN: qrframe – generate beautiful qr codes with javascript code (367 points | 57 comments)
27. Essential node in global semiconductor supply chain hit by Hurricane Helene (211 points | 59 comments)
28. The Netherlands has returned some stolen artifacts to Indonesia (133 points | 125 comments)
29. What the photographer who’s taken philosopher portraits thinks of philosophers (48 points | 18 comments)
30. The Last Sun Sparc Workstation (6 points | discuss)
